afterClose.description: Callback when the keyboard is completely put away

afterShow.description: Callback when the keyboard is completely bounced

closeOnConfirm.description: Whether to automatically close when the ok button is clicked
closeOnConfirm.description_zh: 是否在点击确定按钮时自动关闭

confirmText.description: The text of the confirm button, if null is set, it would be shown
confirmText.description_zh: 确认按钮的文本，如果设置为 null，则会显示

getContainer.description: To get the specified mounted HTML node, the default is body, if null returned, it would be rendered to the current node
getContainer.description_zh: 要获取指定的挂载 HTML 节点，默认为 body，如果返回 null，则将其呈现到当前节点

randomOrder.description: Whether the keyboard is out of order

safeArea.description: Whether to enable safe area padding
safeArea.description_zh: 是否启用安全区域填充

showCloseButton.description: Whether to show the collapsed keyboard arrow
showCloseButton.description_zh: 是否显示折叠的键盘箭头

events.name: onConfirm
events.description: Triggered when the ok button is clicked

events.name: onDelete
events.description: Callback when the content is deleted

events.name: onInput
events.description: Callback when the input content is changed
events.description_zh: 更改输入内容时的回调
